column4: hi, my sound doesnt work, its not the hardware, what can i do? ive had it before
what can i do about my sound not working?
my sound is gone, what shoul i do??
should*
HOW DO I FIX MY SOUND???
try figuring ou whats wrong with it first.
Probably no way to tell that but to manually check it.
speakers aren't usually recognized by an os.. just the sound card
is it in lspci?
doubleclick the volumecontrol icon make sure nothign is muted
that sounds fine
close all apps that may be using the soundcard and then open up just one
that is what mine isi  believe, it is not the error
restart into the rescue shell, do Xorg -configure , mv the new config to /etc/X11/xorg.conf then reboot
from where do u move it?
it will tell you
ok thanks
what did you do exactly?
if /root/ is where it placed it ok, but on my system its just in / .. and it needs to be moved to /etc/X11/xorg.conf
if you typed it exactly as i said and its made no difference then sorry, thats the only way i know of
on a default install i only get 800x600 max, after doing that it goes somewhere around 1900 or more..
/exec
